segments.text: I wonder if you could do me a favor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd be happy to help you . Name it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My printer is broken . Can you print up a copy for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , no problem . Do you want me to edit it for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please , you write much better than I do .
segments.speaker: S1
